TopicTitle: What Do You Think About Life Is Strange?

Articles.Content:
What do you think about Life is Strange, is on steam sale right now and after reading reviews I decided to buy all of it? I paid about €15 for that. And is here my first in game.
 

What do you think about Life is Strange, is on steam sale right now and after reading reviews I decided to buy all of it? I paid about €15 for that. And is here my first in game.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NBrR3j1Htz8

 

 

https://www.quora.com/unanswered/What-do-you-think-about-Life-is-Strange-is-on-steam-sale-right-now-and-after-reading-reviews-I-decided-to-buy-all-of-it-I-paid-about-15-for-that-And-is-here-my-first-in-game

life is strange (the first game) is one of the best story interactive games  ive played, its starts off a bit slow but then becomes so good you wont want to stop playing it.

the 2nd installment i have not played
I'm not a fan of teen drama... from what I've seen it at least starts out that way. I don't think I could get over that for the rest of it.
I don't think about it at all.

1 hour ago, razark said:

I don't think about it at all.

Just believe. It's strange.
